name: 1 Day Minimum Wage
description: When the boss makes a dollar, I make a dime, so I like to poop on company time.

name: Cheap Freelance Task
description: What you might pay upfront for a simple delivery.

name: Cheap Freelance Day of labor
description: Depending on the day and task, you can get ⓜ100 on SUCCESS, 1d10 * ⓜ10 on SNAG, or ⓜ10 on FAILURE.

name: 1 Day Low Wage
description: It's not much but it beats minimum wage!

name: 1 Day of Lower Middle Class Wage
description: The promise of economic mobility is almost in sight!

name: 1 Day of Middle Class Wage
description: Let's hope this class doesn't shrink!

name: 1 Day of Upper Class
description: When people ask what you make, you can start saying "I'm doing well for myself" now.
